name: Handy Desi Wipe
descr:
Handy Desi Lint-Free Disinfection Wipe.
 
Application: Specially developed disinfection wipe for hands, safety equipment, fixtures, keyboards etc. Suitable for use in food production areas. Execellent for use at treatment tables, chairs, desk and computers. The blue color means that the napkin is easier to find if lost.
 
Instructions: 1. Remove the entire cap on which the lid is attached. 2. locate the inner tissue in the roll and pull it our through the smalle hole in the center of the lid. 3. replace the cap and close the lid so that it closes thightly.
 
Wipe size: 22 x 22 cm. 
 
Content: Tetra potassium pyrophosphate.
 
Safety phrases: P305+P351+P338.
 
Further information: Keep out of reach of children.
 
Optional: Wall hanger item no. C1176-1.
